welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bukit Mertajam, where the rich history and diverse culture meet in a charming blend of old and new. Explore our vibrant markets, taste the delicious local cuisine, and soak in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Restoran Nasi Kandar Ali
restaurants.description: Restoran Nasi Kandar Ali is a indian restaurant located in Bukit Mertajam.
restaurants.address: Jalan Pasar, 14000 Bukit Mertajam, Pulau Pinang

restaurants.name: Heng Lee Restaurant (Dua Gao)
restaurants.description: Heng Lee Restaurant (Dua Gao) is a chinese restaurant located in Bukit Mertajam.
restaurants.address: Jalan Bunga Raya, 14000 Bukit Mertajam, Pulau Pinang

restaurants.name: 大山脚传统曼煎糕 
restaurants.description: 大山脚传统曼煎糕  is a food truck located in Bukit Mertajam.

restaurants.name: Sentosa Corner 聖淘莎茶餐室
restaurants.description: Sentosa Corner 聖淘莎茶餐室 is a food court located in Bukit Mertajam.

restaurants.name: 伯公埕广西福建面（祥哥）
restaurants.description: 伯公埕广西福建面（祥哥） is a breakfast spot located in Bukit Mertajam.
